codeReload.description: Allows code to autoreload, no need to restart anymore

language.description: The general language used for the system and any user not manually configured

owner.description: An array of users who can run any command

secureGroup.description: A secure group to receive logs when the system fails to send to the correct person or chat, false is disabled

stickerAuthor.description: The author of the made stickers, set as default to create automatic names based on group and user names

stickerPack.description: The pack of stickers, keep (optional) default to help oficial devs XD

secretKey.description: The password used to ignore owner and admin requirements, never use default, create a VERY STRONG password, because this can be EXTREME DANGEROUS

prefixes.description: The prefixes to be declared as a command, does not affect noprefix commands

perfomanceMode.description: If activated, Ãris will execute everything without waiting for finishing the other tasks, this can cause several lags and bugs, but makes commands more faster

waitMessage.description: If enabled, Ãris will send a message to request user to wait command finish to avoid lags

botCommands.description: Defines whether Ãris should execute commands from her messages, but remember, this can have serious bugs.

listenBroadcasts.description: Defines if Ãris should not ignore people sending status or broadcasts (Yes, Ãris sees everything).

listenReactions.description: Defines if Ãris should not ignore reactions, if yes, it will drop reactions as messages.

ExpPerMessage.description: The quantity of XP obtained per message, except from reactions, Ãris and broadcasts (if disable).
